scripts.terraform:build:
copyfiles -f src/terraform/*.tf config/"${ENV:=dev}"/settings.tf build/terraform && echo appversion='"'$npm_package_version'"
'functionapp='"'../functionapp-$npm_package_version.zip'"' > build/terraform/terraform.tfvars
scripts.terraform:apply: terraform -chdir=build/terraform init && terraform -chdir=build/terraform validate && terraform -chdir=build/terraform apply
scripts.build:zip: copyfiles -u 1 src/functions/* src/functions/**/* build && copyfiles package.json build/functions && cd build/functions && npm install --production && jszip-cli --output ../functionapp-$npm_package_version.zip add .
